name: Hurkle
description: Bred by TGA Genetics, Hurkle is a hybrid cross between the high-CBD sativa Harlequin and a Querkle indica. Most Hurkle phenotypes will hover around a 1:1 ratio of THC and CBD, but some variation should be expected. Flavors of grape, coffee, and chocolate overwhelm the palate in a flavorful introduction to Hurkle’s calming effects. CBD and THC team up to crush pain, stress, and anxiety, leaving you feeling relaxed in both mind and body.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Hungry, Happy, Focused, Sleepy, Pain, Depression, Headaches, Stress, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
